WRITING.TEXT: I love having a rug in the kitchen- an easily washable one, right in front of the sink.
I'm taking it outdoors around 10am in a very shaded location. Thank you! I'll have to practice a bit with those settings, I've honestly never used aperture priority, I just shoot manual everything.
Oh I should have added- it's outside, 10am, but the area is mostly shade

WRITING.TITLE: First portrait shoot this weekend with a couple and their four month old. Any tips or things you wish you had known before your first? Thank you!
